content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Good afternoon, Max. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I'm sure it will be a great fit for you. As for the rental price, I am willing to negotiate. What are your thoughts on the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max. I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 700 Euros. I believe that is a fair price for this apartment, given its size and location. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Is there anything else you need to discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all. Thank you for your help. I will sign the agreement.
TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: My apologies, Max. It seems like there was a misunderstanding. I am not sure what you meant by "TERMINATE". Could you please clarify?
name: Heinrich Heine
